# B9623-240120-CUAET Emergency Hotel Booking

## Brief Description

Canada is seeking offers from Offerors to provide emergency hotel booking services to Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada (IRCC) clients and their families between January 2, 2024 and April 14, 2024 with two (2) additional option periods of four (4) months.

## Tender Details

* **Tender ID:** WS4221957087
* **Reference Number:** 4272551126
* **Publication Date:**  October 23, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date and Time ( EST ):** December 5, 2023, at 14:00 hours

## Tender Amendments

•  The closing time of the response deadline in the Ariba Discovery posting and CanadaBuys posting has been amended. Please disregard this posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by December 5, 2023, at 14:00 EST. All bids submitted after 14:00 EST will be declared non-responsive.

## Tendered Services

The successful Offeror will provide Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada (IRCC) clients and their families with 24/7 emergency hotel booking services through an online and telephone centre.

## Regions of Delivery

*   Canada:

## Regions of Opportunity

None

## Trade Agreements

The tender is subject to the following trade agreements: Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement.
